member.summary: A simple Python command-line should mimic the standard python.exe

member.name: M:IronPythonConsole.PythonCommandLine.ReadStatement(System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Read a statement, which can potentially be a multiple-line statement suite (like a class declaration).
member.param: Should the console session continue, or did the user indicate that it should be terminated?
member.returns: Expression to evaluate. null for empty input
